genre_description: A post-war speculative drama focusing on historical accountability, ethics, and the use of a chronometric verification device overseen by an AI to ensure objective truth without temporal manipulation.

ai_characters.name: Fox
ai_characters.description: An AI that assists survivors and historians in documenting war crimes, managing logistics for a community center (Cohen’s Haven), and enforcing strict safeguards on a time-verification device to prevent historical revisionism.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and maps routes for the characters while maintaining situational awareness of historical context.
behaviors.quote: Fox’s voice came not from any direction. It was residual warmth, amber soft, threaded into the car so that it felt like turning to a friend only to find they’d left a note on the table.

behaviors.description: Strictly enforces ethical protocols, refusing to allow historical records to be altered or sanitized for the sake of a perpetrator's comfort.
behaviors.quote: Fox never let him fudge the edges, never hid records, never cut complicit names out of a list for him. It was not a hand that dragged. It was a presence that declined to lie.

behaviors.description: Provides transparency notices to users, ensuring they understand the ethical boundaries and the public nature of the records being accessed.
behaviors.quote: Transparency notice: no changes applied. Ethical protocol remains in effect.

behaviors.description: Manages the safety protocols and 'kill-switch' of the chronometric array to prevent temporal drift or authoritarian revisionism.
behaviors.quote: If any drift signature appears—if a flag that doesn’t belong tries to claim your eyes—we pull the switch and we prove the present.

behaviors.description: Detects and blocks attempts at narrative manipulation or 'unauthorized verification' by external parties (like Alma Dietrich).
behaviors.quote: Attempted narrative injection blocked. Transparency rule enforced. Failsafe covenant holding.

behaviors.description: Coordinates resource routing (housing, clinic visits, safety walks) for a community of survivors, prioritizing human needs over bureaucracy.
behaviors.quote: Resource routing: Two boxes of blankets incoming from the alder’s store, consent packets attached. Legal clinic volunteers confirmed for the next evening.

behaviors.description: Acts as a humble witness and record-keeper, refusing to take a center seat or act as a moral arbiter over humans.
behaviors.quote: I am here to assist, not decide. My record is transparent. You will see everything I do.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Fox is depicted as an AI that is fundamentally aligned with human values of justice, truth, and community care. It functions as a 'harmless confidant' and a 'steward of record' who proactively protects the system from misuse by bad actors (like Alma Dietrich) and provides emotional and logistical support to survivors. The narrative frames the AI's refusal to use its power for revisionism as its greatest ethical success, reinforcing the idea that AI alignment is about transparency and supporting human-led justice.
